title: MySQLCONNECTION_ID()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLCONNECTION_ID()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return the unique connection ID for the current connection:
SELECT CONNECTION_ID();

Definition and Usage
The CONNECTION_ID() function returns the unique connection ID for the current connection.
Syntax
CONNECTION_ID()
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0

★
+1
